alert.note: Alert for Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 13 at 6:02AM CDT until June 13 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WISE AND NORTHEASTERN PARKER COUNTIES... At 602 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Briar, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Briar, Reno, Springtown, New Fairview, Aurora, Boyd, Sanctuary, La Junta, Cottondale, Highland Addition and Keeter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows.
